description: AP-07 is the legacy RTO code for Guntur district in Andhra Pradesh. Since February 2019, the state implemented the 'one state-one code' policy where all new vehicles are registered with AP-39/AP-40 series. This office continues to manage legacy AP-07 registrations.
address: Regional Transport Office, J.K.C College Road, Swarnabharathi Nagar, Guntur, Andhra Pradesh
